item.title: Pivotal Research hikes Netflix price target to Street-high $1,100 after Tyson-Paul fight
item.description: The record-breaking numbers for the match between Mike Tyson and Jake Paul show Netflix's preeminence in the streaming sector, per Pivotal Research.

item.title: European Central Bank warns rising trade tensions increased risks to financial stability
item.description: The Financial Stability Review also said weak growth was now a bigger threat to the 20-nation euro zone than high inflation.

item.title: Delta forecasts more sales growth in 2025 thanks to high-end demand, 'resilient economy'
item.description: Delta, the most profitable U.S. airline, expects to expand capacity by no more than 4% year-over-year in 2025.

item.title: Disney debuts its latest cruise ship, Treasure, as part of a plan to double its fleet by 2031
item.description: The Disney Treasure will make its maiden voyage in December, officially becoming the sixth ship in the company's cruise line.

item.title: U.S. closes embassy in Kyiv over potential 'significant' air attack as tensions with Russia soar
item.description: The U.S. has closed its embassy in Kyiv, warning that it has "received specific information of a potential significant air attack" on Wednesday.
